text: Hi everyone I am having an issue that has suddenly popped up on a live site I am working on. I have 2 custom modules on the home page. 1 that pulls in a specific category of posts through a loop for 2 different blogs & one that uses custom fields where the client can set specific categories. Both loops were working fine until we launched now every link in both modules takes you to the same/wrong link. The console is showing the correct links though.
add a position relative to your links
<@U38EZFVFE> I sent the wrong screenshot for that. There is some psuedo class styling I am using to try and match an animation from their old site. I think the ain issue is with my slider
no it is actually those links
they are covering the entire screen
you can inspect them in chrome and see
<@U38EZFVFE> you’re right. Thanks you so much

Hi there-- as I'm running npm run deploy I keep getting an error in the console that says:
```[ERROR] Uploading file "/Users/hayleyhartman/Desktop/boxcast-HubSpot/dist/boxcast-dynamic-templates/bdt-table.module/module.html" to "boxcast-dynamic-templates/bdt-table.module/module.html" failed
[ERROR] internal error
[ERROR] line 16: Table `[ ALL OF THE TABLE INFO ]` not found in your account.```
I wasn't having this error last time I was working on this (Friday), and I'm wondering if I need to refresh my CMS Access key, and if there's even a way of doing so? Any advice would be appreciated
Hey Louis, thats a great idea to add to the button module. I’ll pass this feedback along to our teams internally on this suggestion!
